abstract: Fort Lean is a big band playing small rooms that, especially compared with many of the acts performing this week, feels comically out of place.
snippet: Fort Lean is a big band playing small rooms that, especially compared with many of the acts performing this week, feels comically out of place.
lead_paragraph: The typical misunderstanding about the CMJ Music Marathon is that it's a festival devoted to indie rock. In the past, maybe, that would have been fair, but in recent years it's bent at the borders, allowing for hip-hop, electronic music, sounds from around the globe and more.

headline.main: Fort Lean Is Already a Standout at CMJ
